author: vors
body:
Since we are not build FullCLR version anymore, I removed the following:

- map.json files
- map.json related stuff from build.psm1
- windows-full build docs

You can keep this PR around until FullCLR would be completely removed.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Will keep this PR around until we decide to remove FullCLR powershell from the repository.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT Shall we go ahead with this PR? I hope building for FullCLR is not in scope anymore.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
A new PR #4532 is created for the same changes of this PR (it's easier than resolving the conflicts and taking over this PR).
Hence, I will close this PR.

title: Remove inapplicable documentation and build helpers
